original_title: The Zombies: Odessey & Oracle (Revisited) - The 40th Anniversary Concert
overview: Rod Argent, Colin Blunstone, Chris White and Hugh Grundy reunite to perform their classic "Odessey & Oracle" album live in concert for the very first time. Taped at the Shepherd's Bush Empire, London, 2008.
title: The Zombies: Odessey & Oracle (Revisited) - The 40th Anniversary Concert
